titles.title: A bill to implement the President's request to increase the statutory limit on the public debt.

action.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 94.

bill.summary: 7/5/2011--Introduced. Increases the statutory limit on the public debt from $14.294 trillion to $16.7 trillion.
